announcements.title: Major Mode System Update
announcements.message: Effect modes have been completely redesigned. Multiple modes can now be used simultaneously. Create spinning rainbow effects with Rotate + Rainbow combinations. Speed controls optimized with enhanced settings panel.

announcements.title: Performance Improvements and Bug Fixes
announcements.message: Rotate mode speed settings fixed with more precise control. Local Rotate mode optimized for solar system effects. User interface improvements implemented and unnecessary notifications removed.
